name: Beach Defend 2000
description:
BEACH DEFEND 2000 is the new, pulse-pounding, high intensity shooter from XCVG Systems.

There's an army invading, and it's your job to hold the line. They've got reserves and they get stronger every time, but you've got an arsenal of your own at your disposal. Defend the beach, upgrade your weaponry, and save the day.

An homage to the turret shooters of the late 90s and early 2000s, particularly Beachhead 2000 (a personal favourite) but with a modern twist. Created for So Bad It's Good Jam 2019, so set your expectations accordingly.
